title: BiosprayTech 2023
text:
This map Figure 1 is interactive, you can choose the visibility of each layer (click on the left).





Figure 1: Map of BiosprayTech experimenal field



In this experiment, 2 factors were tested Table 1 :

the dose of phytosanitary products : from 0.7 to 2x the reference dose (1N)
the spray pattern :

FpF : face per face, both sides of the grapevine row received spray directly
Uf : only one side of the row received spray directly
BH : both sides of the row received spray directly, and the spray is oriented from bottom to top with higher dosage in the bunches area
